name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Node Engineer with 8 years of experience in Full Stack Development, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **ExpressJS**, and **REST API** design. Proficient in building robust applications using **MongoDB** and **Mongoose**, and utilizing **Jest** for testing and **Swagger** for API documentation. My work in Agile and SCRUM environments has enabled me to effectively manage projects and collaborate with cross-functional teams. I possess a strong understanding of microservices architecture and security practices, including **oAuth** and **JWT** for authentication.

In addition to core competencies, I bring extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **Azure DevOps**, implementing CI/CD pipelines and TDD approaches for high-quality software delivery. My previous roles included leading enterprise-level projects that required integration with healthcare and financial APIs while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. I am dedicated to leveraging technology to drive innovative solutions, contributing to predictive analytics and real-time performance enhancements.

Implemented real-time data processing pipelines exploiting **microservices** for high availability and responsiveness in web applications, reducing latency by **30%**.
Utilized **oAuth** and **JWT** for secure authentication and authorization of APIs, enforcing best security practices across applications.
Optimized application performance through code reviews and refactoring, resulting in improved response times averaging under **200ms** for critical endpoints.

- Managed deployment pipelines using **Azure DevOps** and ensured operational excellence through agile methodologies including **SCRUM** for continuous integration and delivery across teams.
